1.0.name: wordpress/embed-image
1.0.description:
The Embed Image WordPress Plugin offers an alternative solution to your readers who take your images and republish them on their own websites. The Embed Image alternative benefits you in enough ways that you’ll begin encouraging readers to republish your images!

Features | How It Works | Integrate | Register Free!

Results include: Increased SEO from links back that are included with every embedded image Ad revenue from the overlay ad space displayed with each embedded image Additional traffic to your website from links back as well as the embedded image being clickable

Here's what Embed Image Technology does: 1) Your images will be embeddable with just a cl
